alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 8:19PM CDT until June 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Atchison County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Holt County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Auburn, or 19 miles west of Tarkio, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Rock Port, Fairfax, Craig, Corning, Indian Cave State Park and Phelps City. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 94 and 114. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
